Description: Sandstone funerary stela of Petros, deacon and monk; eight lines of Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.142)
Bierbrier 1994 / Provenances gained and lost (65-66, pl.11b)
Revillout 1885 / Les prières pour les morts dans l’épigraphie égyptienne (12 (no.16)) (miscited as EA 611)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Synopsis 1848 / Synopsis of the Contents of the British Museum (p.192)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I App:13 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: SB Kopt. I 481 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
